title: Her Salvation
description: James Westing has always been a ladies man and he has never considered the idea of settling down with one woman. However, after spending two nights with Gabriella Parker he has found himself chasing the one that has captured his heart. The unattainable Gabriella is back in town for good and James has spent countless hours by her side after a near fatal gunshot wound. Gabriella however has lived a secret life and is determined to keep it that way. Hence, is why she is unable to commit to James. Did he do it all for nothing? Will she keep pushing James away in order to keep him from finding out who she really is? Does she push him too far? Now that she has finally pushed him away, Gabriella is finding that her thoughts keep drifting back to James. Is she too late? Will Gabriella be able to break away from her past and reveal her secrets or will she keep putting her life in jeopardy?
author: L. Sommers
